Events
  • April 23, 2022
    [Switch~ Ensemble] residency at Colby College in Waterville, Maine, performing music by José Martínez, Kelley Sheehan, Anna-Louise Walton, and more.
    Colby College, Waterville, ME
  • March 25, 2022
    Five Premieres: New commissions from Leilehua Lanzilotti, Santiago Diez Fischer, Anna-Louise Walton, Forbes Graham, and Kelley Sheehan by the [Switch~ Ensemble]
    University Settlement, New York, NY
  • February 15, 2022
    [Switch~] is Ensemble-in-Residence at the University of Missouri. Conducting the Missouri premiere of soliloquios del viento (2016; rev. 2017) alongside works by Cathy van Eck, Anna-Louise Walton, and Mizzou student composers with the [Switch~ Ensemble].
    Crow Hall, Columbia, MO
  • February 13, 2022
    [Switch~] is Ensemble-in-Residence at the University of Missouri. Works by Leilehua Lanzilotti, Christopher Chandler, and Heather Stebbins at the George Caleb Bingham Art Gallery.
    George Caleb Bingham Art Gallery, Columbia, MO

    Bangkok Art and Culture Centre, Bangkok, Thailand

    Magdeburg, Germany

    DiMenna Center for Classical Music, New York, NY
